Translations.Text: Dagi, ur as illi, assa, uebib
ne$ ucci siwa ioesvan
Teppen ten kan imednuben
Ihi, ad Galle$ s wayen tepwalim
akked wayen ur tepwalim
ar wagi, s tidep, d awal Umazan ukyis
Ur illi d awal umedyaz; drus kan ay tumnem
Ur illi d awal ugezzan; drus ay d tepmektayem
D tarusi s$uo Mass imavalen
Lemmer a d iskiddeb fellaÂ£ deg wawalen
seg uyeffus ar at Neddem
d$a, aeao n wul is, ad as Negzem
Ur ippili degwen w ara t ifukken
Neppa, ih, ar d asmekti i wid ipeezziben
Neeoa, s tidep, ar llan garawen inekkaoen
Neppa, ih, d tawa$it ijehliyen
Neppa, ih, d tidep itebbtenE
Sbuccaa isem n Mass ik Ameqwoaean
Isteqsa yiwen, af uaaqeb iuran
i ijehliyen. Ur t ipxauam yiwen
S$uo Oebbi, Bab n tseddaoin
Lmalayek akked ooue, ppalin $uoeS, deg wass idumen smuset igima iseggwasen
Ihi, eubeo uuebo ifazen
Nitni, s tidep, walan t ibaad
Nwala t d aqoib
Asmi ara yili igenni, am uzzal ifsin
idurar ad ilin am tavui
Aebib ur isteqsay aebib
